#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 int main()
 {


     int t,n,p,x,count;
     cin>>t;
     while(t--)
     {
         count=0;
         cin>>n>>p;
         for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
         {
             cin>>x;
             if(x>=p)count++;
         }
         cout<<count<<endl;
     }
     return 0;
 }
